summary: Senior IT leader with 20+ years of experience in ITSM, ITOM, SRE, FinOps, automation and large-scale service operations. Strong background in designing stable, scalable processes, leading cross-functional teams, and delivering cost-optimisation and reliability improvements across enterprise environments.

experience.title: Senior Manager — ITSM & FinOps
bullets: Led ITSM and FinOps initiatives to improve cloud cost visibility and control.
Defined and implemented FinOps governance frameworks for tagging, reporting and optimization.
Partnered with finance, engineering and operations teams to deliver measurable cost savings.
Drove ITSM improvements to streamline workflows and reduce incident lifecycle.

experience.title: Associate Director — ITSM Automation, CustomGPT & ITOM Enablement
bullets: Owned enterprise-wide ITSM automation programs, from concept to implementation.
Designed and deployed CustomGPT-based knowledge and automation accelerators.
Enabled ITOM frameworks including monitoring, event correlation and reduction.
Standardised automation patterns and mentored teams to improve uptake.

experience.title: Associate Director — Global Process Owner (ITSM, SRE & Capacity Management)
bullets: Served as Global Process Owner for ITSM, SRE and capacity management functions.
Implemented capacity planning and forecasting to reduce over-provisioning.
Established reliability engineering frameworks and runbook standards.
Collaborated with delivery teams to align incident, change and release practices.

experience.title: Senior Consultant — ITSM & Automation Leader
bullets: Led enterprise-scale ITSM implementations and automation solutions.
Automated recurring operational tasks and incident remediation workflows.
Collaborated with customers to translate business requirements into scalable processes.
Guided junior engineers and standardized operational documentation.

experience.title: Senior Technical Associate — Lead, Infrastructure & Monitoring Solutions
bullets: Designed and deployed infrastructure monitoring solutions across global accounts.
Owned alerting standards, dashboards and monitoring configurations.
Provided escalation-level technical support and incident management.
Improved system stability through proactive tuning and capacity checks.

experience.title: Senior 2nd Line Specialist — Technical SME & Support Escalation Lead
bullets: Acted as SME for high-priority escalations from L1 and L2 teams.
Resolved critical incidents and coordinated across engineering teams.
Created and maintained knowledge base articles and SOPs.
Led efforts to reduce ticket reopens and improve resolution quality.
